NY Student Class Grade Detail Export
export-definition.comment: The schedule change history effective date must be later than the Q4 term end date for this extract to work correctly for the graduating seniors. Look at the Q4 term end date for the HS and look at a graduated senior's schedule change history effective drop date. If this date is on or before the Q4 term end date, it must be mass updated to one day after the Q4 term end date. Global top tab to Student Schedule Change History table. Filter on the effective date equals the effective drop date on a graduated senior. Look at the records to ensure that they have a status of graduated and grade 12. Mass update the effective date to one day after the Q4 term end date. This extract will now export records for all graduates with a code of P and credit earned for all valid courses that have been completed successfully.
